item.title: First Post
item.description: Let’s give this blogging thing a go…

item.title: Brew 0012
item.description: This beer has a bit of a history. It’s originally from Home Brew Beer by Greg Hughes, which I first brewed as a partial extract batch way back in 2014. It went down really well with my wife, so I brewed it again when we were expecting our first child. It was really nice celebrating the birth (and her ability to drink again) with a cold refreshing glass of the pink stuff.
